Bits< N > Struct Template Reference

Bits Gives an easy-to-use interface vor bitwise operations on data. Example : union {Bits<8> bits; char byte;} mask; This will give you access to the bits of mask by e.g. mask.bits[2] and to the whole byte as char. More...

Detailed Description

template<int N>
struct Bits< N >

Bits Gives an easy-to-use interface vor bitwise operations on data. Example : union {Bits<8> bits; char byte;} mask; This will give you access to the bits of mask by e.g. mask.bits[2] and to the whole byte as char.
